attributes.action: Jacob Rees Mogg should be stripped of his title of Leader of the House
attributes.background: Due to his behavior in the House of Commons during the debate on September 3rd 2019, Jacob Rees Mogg should be stripped of his position as The Leader of the House. His Values and Conduct do not represent those of our Government. His actions help sow discord between the General Public and Parliament

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. This includes petitions asking for people to lose their jobs.
